name: Caretaker Weevil
description: The Caretaker Weevil is a medium-sized beast known for its calming presence and ability to stabilize allies.
memorable: Its unique abilities to calm hostile creatures and stabilize allies make it a valuable companion in any scenario.
goals: To support allies and incapacitate enemies, providing stabilization and calming powers during battles.
relations: May be found alongside other supportive creatures or allies in combat.
environment: Often found in habitats where cooperation and support among creatures are essential.
strengths: High hit points provide durability, and its calming abilities can influence combat dynamics.
weaknesses: Relatively weak offensive capabilities; relies on allies for damage.
attacks: Melee attack with mandibles dealing slashing damage, and a ranged Glue Glob attack dealing acid damage while restraining targets.
most_powerful_ability: Calming Presence creates a zone of peace that can incapacitate hostile creatures within its vicinity.
senses: Has tremorsense allowing it to detect movement within 30 feet.
skills: Possesses a perception skill bonus of +2, enabling it to notice hidden threats adequately.
additional_information: Can stabilize allies at 0 hit points.
Prevents corpses from decaying or rising as Undead for 24 hours.
Regenerative Spittle can heal allies over time.
